title: Historian on women in the Revolution - support

content.question: Which of the following pieces of evidence could best be used to support the argument in the excerpt?

choices.label: A record of deeds and land titles held by widows during the American Revolution
Statistics showing the changes in average family size before and after the Revolution
Correspondence between husbands and wives involved in Revolutionary politics
Studies comparing the literacy rates for men and women during the Revolutionary era

content.answer: Correspondence between husbands and wives involved in Revolutionary politics

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
